system.description:
When a faction tries to track a Status-1 or Status-2 character down within the city, roll.

  • If the faction has a relevant asset, add 1
  • If their quarry is of the same Circle, add 1
  • If the faction is Size-1 or Strength-1, subtract 1
  • If their quarry is actively hiding, subtract 1

miss.label: Miss
miss.value:
If the quarry is an NPC: On a miss, the faction's attempts to track them down succeed, but their agents make a mess of things and allow the quarry to escape.

If the quarry is a PC: On a miss, someone close to the PC tips them off early to the faction's search...and an opportunity or weakness the PC can exploit.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
If the quarry is an NPC: On a 7-9, the faction finds their quarry; they attack them, kidnap them, or confront them at some cost.

If the quarry is a PC: On a 7-9, the faction tracks down their location, but the PC has time to prepare for the limited forces coming their way.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
If the quarry is an NPC: On a 10+, they catch the quarry exposed or vulnerable; the faction can act upon the quarry with impunity.

If the quarry is a PC: On a 10+, the tracking faction gets the best of their quarry; they corner the PC with overwhelming force or careful planning that leaves them little room to avoid their pursuers.
